bug.author: mengpengfei
bug.summary: java api runs much slower than Python API
bug.description: i predict image with python api only need 15ms, but with the same model,java api need 500+ms

comments.comment: the java api need 400+ms code: List<Tensor<?>> tesnsors=s.runner().feed("input", image).fetch("dense_decoded").run(); but the python api only need about 40ms ï¼Œ i think java api should more faster than the python api, what can i do to let java api more faster?

i test it on the same computer,the same model,the same image the tensorflow version is 1.12.0.
org.tensorflow tensorflow 1.12.0

yes of course, my goal is to solve this problem, but nobody solve it
